title: Match History
body: Missing match history for the last 2 games I've played so it's not counting towards the bilgewater quest

replies.body:
Hey everyone,

Thanks for the reports.

It's currently being investigated. We believe we've identified the issue and are working on a resolution. 

No ETA yet. There is messaging up in client as well.

Hi ya,

Its been 4 hours, do you have an update for us mate?
Kinda sucks to be playing for the last 6 hours with no match history not knowing if I'm wasting my time or not. Lol

Also, is now the time we start talking about compensation? :P

Cheers
yup same problem............ fix this rito pls
hey. . same here!!!{{champion:32}}
same problem here boyz (and/or girls)
same problem here boyz (and/or girls) :(
Yep, good to know it isn't just me.
yes yes same here i would have done my minions but nope

The in client match history has had problems since they introduced the new system.

It's been slowly getting worse, but you'd generally have to wait 10+ minutes to have a game be in the history, though lately that is getting to an hour plus.
My games from almost 4 hours ago haven't come in.

Same.  Although there was a game where EVERYONE lagged out/disconnected for 20seconds and from then on nothing has been saving.  No match history, no points for Bilgewater etc.  I have played about 6 games since then.  What is going on Riot!? :O :'(
Same here.
same here (4 games), hoping they will get updated soon :(
guess who completed the second act >> me <<

Hey everyone, 

We're still continuing to work on the issue. It's a hardware issue within the datacenter. We're working through our provider to try and resolve the issue. It's taking a lot longer than anticipated. In the meantime we're looking into potential ways to reroute the traffic off of that hardware as a backup solution. I'll update again in the next hour (hopefully we'll have some good news). 

Once the link is restored, history should trickle back to you all.


Update#2 - We've gotten traction with the ISP where a software issue is occurring. We hope to have more information within the hour. 

Edit- Not sure where my red name is...checking on that. I'm a live producer working with the engineering team solving the problem.

Hey guys! 

Just doing a quick verify that ArmiesofZnight is a Rioter who is helping to get this fixed up.

Hey all, 

Apologies for the length of time this is taking. We're continuing to work with the ISP on the software issue. We've not received a solid ETA yet.
I reckon its just the server being very busy right now
lol same! for me 7 games!
Same and I've played 9 games.
Same here - last 4 ARAM's - no match history and no stats towards the event - hope i'm still getting IP at least.
same problem here boyz (and/or girls) :(
Played couple games today and just checked to see  the progress only to find it was 0 %.
yes this is quite bothersome
Same over here :c {{item:3070}}
Same for me.
